name: taro
description: a local browser using manifests as the data source

scripts.start: npm run build && NODE_ENVIRONMENT='production' node index
scripts.dev: npm run build && NODE_ENVIRONMENT='development' nodemon index
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
scripts.build:js: npm run build:jsx && npm run build:bundle
scripts.watch:js: npm run build:js && onchange src/*.js src/**/*.js -- npm run build:js
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && onchange src/*.css src/**/*.css -- npm run build:css

author: cvan
